猴子偷桃.definition: "monkey steals the peach" (martial arts), distracting an opponent with one hand and seizing his testicles with the other; (coll.) grabbing sb by the balls

猴年馬月.definition: long time off; time that will never come

猴急.definition: impatient; to be in a rush (to do sth); anxious; fretful; agitated

猴猴族.definition: Qauqaut, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

猴王.definition: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]

猴麵包.definition: see 猴麵包樹|猴面包树[hou2 mian4 bao1 shu4]

猴麵包樹.definition: boabab tree; monkey-bread tree; Adansonia digitata (botany)
